mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_tables (table_title, table_kc, table_color, table_component, table_material, table_manufacturer, table_country, table_size, table_delivery, table_qa, table_cstel, protable_postid, shiptable_info, shiptable_fee, shiptable_plusfee, shiptable_unable, shiptable_propotionalfee, refundtable_fee, exchangetable_fee, refundtable_address) VALUES (#{table_title}, #{table_kc}, #{table_color}, #{table_component}, #{table_material}, #{table_manufacturer}, #{table_country}, #{table_size}, #{table_delivery}, #{table_qa}, #{table_cstel}, #{protable_postid}, #{shiptable_info}, #{shiptable_fee}, #{shiptable_plusfee}, #{shiptable_unable}, #{shiptable_propotionalfee}, #{refundtable_fee}, #{exchangetable_fee}, #{refundtable_address});

INSERT INTO product_details (detail_id, detail_name, detail_value, dtop_catecode, dprodetails_postid) VALUES ((SELECT COALESCE(MAX(detail_id), 0)+1 from product_details), #{detail_name}, #{detail_value}, #{dtop_catecode}, #{dprodetails_postid});
